definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Making the law by judges has its necessity and objectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 法官制法有其必要性和客观性。

sentences.english: It is significant to objectively judge the actions' social harmfulness.
sentences.chinese: 坚持行为杜会危害性判断的客观性，意义重大。

sentences.english: An abstract conception with feelings of reality and spatial outwardness attached to it.
sentences.chinese: 带有现实感和空间客观性的一个抽象概念。

sentences.english: It provides theoretical basis for exploring the objectivity of difficult cases.
sentences.chinese: 这为探寻疑难案件的客观性提供了理论依据。

sentences.english: Daston more detailed study of the history of the evolution of the concept of objectivity.
sentences.chinese: 达斯顿比较详尽地考察了客观性概念的演变史。

sentences.english: A given ethnic culture has its historical objectiveness and is the foundation of its cultural identity.
sentences.chinese: 民族文化具有历史客观性，是文化认同的基石。

sentences.english: The defense lawyers did this with professional objectivity.
sentences.chinese: 辩护律师们以专业的客观性做到这一点。

sentences.english: Recognize and mitigate impairments to independence and objectivity.
sentences.chinese: 识别和减轻对独立性和客观性的损害。

sentences.english: The object of the democratic supervision has two basic characteristics:objectivity and be of target.
sentences.chinese: 监督客体具有客观性和对象性两个基本特性。

sentences.english: T answer in the language examinations can also reach a higher objective.
sentences.chinese: 外语考试采用笔答方式也可以达到较高客观性的。

sentences.english: Harding noted that the concept of objectivity and complex polysemy.
sentences.chinese: 哈丁注意到客观性概念的多义和复杂。

sentences.english: Some question whether objectivity is desirable.
sentences.chinese: 一些人质疑客观性是否可取。

sentences.english: Up to this point, the discussion has shown three meanings of objectivity.
sentences.chinese: 根据上面的讨论，便知客观性一词实具三个意义。

sentences.english: Analyze the index system objectivity of the state level-scientific research institutesynthetic evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 分析中央级科研院所综合评价的指标体系客观性。

sentences.english: Transparency brings us to reliability the way objectivity used to.
sentences.chinese: 透明度就像过去客观性那样带给我们可靠性。

sentences.english: The two methods of evaluation assure the objectiveness of the evaluation model.
sentences.chinese: 两种评估思想的应用保证了该模型效能评估的客观性。
